right.text: jazzy do you have any siblings? part of me hopes there is only one jazzy.

left.text: just because I ask which one you percieve as being better looking doesn't mean I'm asking which one you'd rather fuck. Prudes.

right.text: I think you'd like me better if you met me for real, when your cronies weren't around to see 'hidden meaning' in nigh everything I say.
if i met you in real life and you were more than 12 i'd be pretty surprised

left.text: jazzy i don't think anything would ever make me like you.
